SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.client

Class ClientData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.client.ClientData
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpponentData, PlayerData
public abstract class ClientData extends Object
The ClientData class contains the common data for all the players in the game. The client must have every player's board, order of the cards, and resources. The class is abstract and is extended by the PlayerData class and the OpponentData class.
